Boston's first subway took its first trip 115 years ago today, going from Park Street Station to Boylston Street.

1 dead after Falmouth plane crash

The crash occurred near the Falmouth Airpark today, leaving two people with life-threatening burns and a third person trapped inside, officials said. (Globe, 1:23 p.m.)

Louisiana slowly recovers from Isaac

Progress is evident, but flood waters linger and more than 400,000 are still without power, days after Hurricane Isaac went through Louisiana. (AP, 2:18 p.m.)
